column4: Does anyone know the feature on the top right of a panel where it says the user and then the power button to logout/restart/power off ect?
on panel, right click on panel ,add to panel and scroll down u will see it
create a new user if u wish
there are always improvemetns in any new release and better hardware support, newer tweaks
overwrites system files and keeps /home intact
all files in home are preserved , but applications itself will be gone to default
